resources.string: To get started, you\'ll need to Authorize with Bungie.\nClick below to get started!
Logging in with Bungie. This should only take a moment!
We were unable to authenticate you with Bungie for some reason. Give it another go!
Checking with Bungie to see if you have the latest copy of the Destiny 2 game database…
Downloading the latest game database from Bungie. This might take a moment… (Progress: %p%)
Sorry, we were unable to download the latest game database from Bungie. The following error was presented: %e
Looks like you have been logged out (%s), you will now be returned to the login screen.\nGo ahead and give it another try after logging back in.
Which platform\'s data would you like to use?
